item.title: Publishing a [github.io Blog] with Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: Publishing a “github.io” Blog with Hugo and Github Pages 0. Prerequisites Github is installed (Link to Github Desktop) 1. Install Hugo [for Windows 10] Create a new folder with the name “Hugo” on C: directory. Inside C:\Hugo, create another new folder with the name “bin”. Download the latest version of Hugo for Windows (which is in .zip format) from Hugo Releases. Extract the zip file into the C:\Hugo\bin, which was created in Step 2.

item.title: TIL 20.11.01
